form.LN:
Izraz
not
uporabljamo za tvorjenje nikalnih stavkov. V govoru se
not
navadno okrajša v
-n't.

sense.def:
Kadar je v glagolski besedni zvezi pomožni ali naklonski glagol, postavimo
not
med pomožni in glavni glagol.

seg.quote: I haven't tried to telephone him.
She couldn't hear the orchestra properly.

sense.def:
Kadar ob glavnem glagolu ni pomožnega, pred
not
dodamo
do
.

seg.quote: I don't agree with everything he says.

sense.def:
Kadar je glavni glagol
be
(biti), uporabljamo
not
brez pomožnega glagola.

seg.quote: There wasn't enough room for everybody.

sense.def:
Kadar
not
uporabimo z glagoli, kot so
think
(misliti),
want
(hoteti) in
seem
(zdeti se), nikalni učinek besede
not
velja za stavek ali nedoločnik, ki pride za omenjenimi glagoli. Na primer,
I don't think she's here
pomeni isto kot
I think she's not here
.

seg.quote: I don't want to talk about it.
The book doesn't seem to be here.

sense.def:
Not
uporabljamo v vprašalnih dostavkih (‘question tags’) za trdilnimi stavki.

seg.quote: That's a new one, isn't it?

sense.def:
Not
uporabljamo v vprašanjih, na primer ko izražamo presenečenje ali nezadovoljstvo.

seg.quote: Don't they realize it's against the law?

sense.def:
Not
uporabljamo, kadar hočemo izraziti zanikani ali nasprotni pomen od pomena pravkar uporabljene besede, besedne zveze ali stavka.

seg.quote: ‘Do you know how much it is?’—‘I'm afraid not.’
They'd know if it was all right or not.

sense.def:
Not
uporabljamo pred
all
,
every
ali
always
, če želimo reči, da obstajajo tudi izjeme sicer splošno veljavnih trditev.

Zvezo
not...but
uporabljamo, če želimo poudariti nasprotje med nečem, kar ni res, in nečem, kar je res.

seg.quote: We wept, not because we were frightened but because we were ashamed.

sense.def:
Izraz
not that
uvaja nikalni stavek, ki zmanjšuje pomembnost prejšnje trditve.

seg.quote: Bob helped him. Not that it was difficult.

sense.def:
Not at all
je poudarjena različica nikalnega odgovora
no
, kadar želimo izraziti občutek ali mnenje.

seg.quote: ‘Does that seem nonsense to you?’—‘Not at all.’

sense.def:
Not at all
je tudi precej formalna oblika odgovora na zahvalo.
